ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This was indeed a most manifest trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That was indeed a trying test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This was indeed a plain trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It was certainly an open trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed this was a clear test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, that indeed was a manifest trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely this is a manifest trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is indeed the manifest trial.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! that verily was a clear test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that surely was a manifest trial,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily that! that was a trial manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This was indeed a manifest test.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For this was obviously a trial-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, that indeed was a manifest trial
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That was indeed a clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This was certainly an evident test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:106] Truly this, sacrifice to which he was commanded, was indeed a clear test’, that is to say, the ultimate test   [of faith].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! that verily was a clear test) that was a manifest trial. 513
